game.title: Dead Cells
game.description: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania-inspired action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle, assuming the role of a failed alchemical experiment trying to figure out what's happening on a gloomy island. Combat is fast and frantic, requiring quick reflexes and smart use of a wide variety of weapons and skills.

specifications.languages: English, Deutsch, Español, Español (America Latina), Français, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Polski, Português, Русский, Türkçe, 繁體中文

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
